title: mc打开应用程序错误
author: czc1101
txt_content:
ava6 7 都装过了。64位的还没试过，不过我是xp的应该不用试。
提示说什么0x000000 什么written的。点确定和取消都没用
好像说是内存条的问题。怎么解决呢

replies.author: 清风后悔
replies.txt_content:
这个。。没截图不想洗！！

不过我也不是高手
路人一个。。打打酱油

replies.author: powerho3
replies.txt_content:
Minecraft has run out of memory.
This could be caused by a bug in the game or by the java Virtual Machine not being allocated enough memry.
If you are playing in a web browser, try downloading the game and playing it offline.
To prevent level corruption,the current game has quit.

是不是这个?

如果是请点击这个http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... hlight=%C4%DA%B4%E6
